articles.title: Argentina goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez auctions World Cup gloves to raise funds for cancer patients
articles.description: “The World Cup finals are not played every day, (the gloves) are special. But it helps a child much more than me having them hanging in a frame in my house,” said Martinez.
articles.content:
In a heartwarming gesture, Argentina goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez auctioned the gloves that he wore during the FIFA World Cup final against France to raise funds for a children’s cancer hospital.

articles.title: College Experience in Argentina Vs. Colleges in the US
articles.description: Leigh Shulman was surprised by how few resources students had at Argentine universities, but it helped her daughter grow up faster as a student.
articles.content:
My daughter and I live in Argentina, and she decided to go to college here instead of in the US.
Her college experience was very different from the one I had in the US.

articles.title: Argentina drought takes toll on crop estimates
articles.description: Trade expectations for corn and soybean crops in Argentina continue to fall as the company experiences one of its worst droughts in 60 years.
articles.content: Trade expectations for corn and soybean crops in Argentina continue to fall as the company experiences one of its worst droughts in 60 years. The first full week of March 2023 continued the trend of hot and dry weeks in Argentina’s main soybean-produ... [1752 chars]
